defineservice.name: metratech.com/TieredUnitRatesPT
defineservice.description: Parameter table for configuring TieredUnitRates Decision attributes

ptype.description: Tier start for the range of number of units covered by the tiered unit rates decision.
Tier end for the range of number of units covered by the tiered unit rates decision.
Override rate for the number of units in the charge that fall within the StartOfUnitRange to EndOfUnitRange range of units.
